images.alt: SiteBuilder Your projects dashboard with multiple projects and conversation status.
images.caption: Dashboard: list projects, see status, add or restore.

images.alt: SiteBuilder Content editor with conversation area and What should we change? input.
images.caption: Chat-based editor: describe changes, get edits.

images.alt: SiteBuilder Content editor next to live preview of a generated landing page.
images.caption: Editor and live result: describe what you want, see the page.

images.alt: SiteBuilder Content editor with Remote Assets sidebar and prompt suggestions.
images.caption: Browse remote assets and use prompt suggestions while editing.

images.alt: SiteBuilder Getting your work area ready setup progress screen.
images.caption: Workspace setup runs automatically when you start a conversation.

images.alt: SiteBuilder content editor, landing page result, and the GitHub PR for the changes.
images.caption:
Edit in chat → see the result → changes in a GitHub PR. The full loop.
SiteBuilder is the content management tool that creators love to use and engineering loves to support.

images.alt: SiteBuilder Edit project: GitHub access key and LLM API key — bring your own keys.
images.caption: Bring your own keys: GitHub token and LLM API key per project.

images.alt: SiteBuilder Settings: S3 upload configuration and GitHub access key.
images.caption: Configure S3 uploads and GitHub access per project.

Token Usage Display.description: Visual progress bar shows tokens used vs. maximum context window. See input and output tokens separately.

Real-Time Cost Estimation.description: See estimated costs as you chat. Input cost, output cost, and total are displayed to 4 decimal places.

Model Name Display.description: Always know which AI model is being used for your editing session.

Create Project.description: Set up new projects by connecting a GitHub repository. Configure the project name, repository URL, and access credentials.

Connect GitHub Repository.description: Link any GitHub repository containing your website or landing pages. Supports both public and private repositories.

Personal Access Token.description: Use fine-grained or classic personal access tokens. UI guidance helps you create tokens with the right permissions.

CSRF Protection.description: All forms include CSRF tokens. Requests without valid tokens are rejected.

Secure Token Storage.description: GitHub tokens and API keys are stored securely. Masked input fields prevent shoulder surfing.

Dark Mode Support.description: Full dark theme throughout the application. Toggle between light and dark mode with persistence.

Responsive Design.description: Mobile-friendly layouts that adapt to any screen size. Work from your phone, tablet, or desktop.

Flash Notifications.description: Success, error, and warning messages displayed as toast-style alerts. Clear feedback on every action.

Keyboard Navigation.description: Full keyboard support with proper focus management. Navigate efficiently without a mouse.

Empty States.description: Helpful messages when there's no data to show. Guidance on what to do next instead of blank screens.

Error Pages.description: Dedicated error pages with recovery options. Clear explanations of what went wrong and how to fix it.

User Registration.description: Sign up with email and password. Get started with your own projects immediately.

Secure Authentication.description: Password-based authentication with secure session management.

Account Dashboard.description: View your account details including email address and member-since date.

Sign Out.description: Securely end your session from any page. Session is fully cleared on sign out.

List Projects.description: View all your projects in a dashboard with real-time workspace status indicators showing availability, active sessions, and review state.

Project Status Overview.description: See at a glance which projects have active editing sessions, are awaiting review, or are available for new work.

Start New Conversation.description: Begin a new editing session for any available project. The workspace initializes automatically if needed.

Resume Conversation.description: Pick up where you left off. Active conversations can be resumed from the project list.

Finish Conversation.description: End your editing session when done. The workspace becomes available for others or for your next session.

Send to Review.description: Submit your changes for review with one click. A GitHub pull request is created automatically.

Automatic Workspace Setup.description: Workspaces initialize automatically when you start your first conversation. No manual setup required.

Setup Progress UI.description: Watch workspace initialization with a progress indicator. Status updates in real-time until setup completes.

Reset Workspace.description: Reset a workspace to start fresh. Ends active sessions and returns the workspace to available state.

Problem Recovery.description: If a workspace enters an error state, a dedicated problem page offers recovery options to reset and try again.

Workspace Status Badges.description: Color-coded badges show workspace state: available, in setup, in conversation, in review, merged, or problem.

Active User Display.description: See who's currently using a workspace. The active user's email is shown when a conversation is in progress.

Automatic Branch Creation.description: Each workspace gets its own Git branch. Changes are isolated until merged, keeping your main branch clean.

Automatic PR Creation.description: When you send changes for review, a GitHub pull request is created automatically with all your commits.

Git Commit History.description: Every change is tracked in Git with clear commit messages. Full history is preserved for auditing.

Reviewer Dashboard.description: Dedicated dashboard for reviewers showing all workspaces awaiting review with project details and quick actions.

Mark as Merged.description: After merging on GitHub, mark the workspace as merged. This transitions it to merged status for tracking.

Reopen for Changes.description: Need revisions? Reopen a workspace for additional edits without losing the existing branch and PR.

Role-Based Access.description: Reviewer role provides access to the review dashboard and approval actions. Regular users can only submit for review.

Workspace Locking.description: Workspaces in review are locked. No additional edits can be made until a reviewer reopens them.

Conversation Ownership.description: Users can only access their own active conversations. Role-based access controls protect sensitive operations.

Edit Project Settings.description: Update project configuration at any time: change the name, update credentials, switch runtime environments, or modify agent instructions.

Background Instructions.description: Set context for the agent: what kind of project is this? What's the brand voice? What conventions should it follow?

Step Instructions.description: Guide how the agent approaches tasks. Should it be conservative or creative? Ask questions or make assumptions?

Output Instructions.description: Control final output format. What should responses include? How should they be structured?

Project Type Templates.description: Sensible defaults based on project type. Landing pages get different defaults than documentation projects.

Runtime Environment Selection.description: Choose which Docker image to use: Node.js 18/20/22, Python 3.12, PHP 8.4, or specify a custom image.

Custom Docker Images.description: Need special tools? Specify any Docker image and SiteBuilder validates it exists before saving.

LLM Provider Selection.description: Choose your AI provider. Currently supports OpenAI and Anthropic with extensible provider architecture.

Collapsible Advanced Section.description: Agent configuration lives in a collapsible "Advanced" section. Quick setup stays simple; power users can customize.

Soft Delete Projects.description: Delete projects safely with soft deletion. Deleted projects move to a "Deleted Projects" section for potential recovery.

Restore Deleted Projects.description: Changed your mind? Restore soft-deleted projects back to active status with a single click.

Permanent Deletion.description: Permanently remove projects when you're certain. A confirmation dialog prevents accidental permanent deletion.

Quick Links.description: Direct links from the project list to GitHub repository, workspace branch, and pull requests for fast navigation.

Branch URL Display.description: View the workspace branch on GitHub directly to see all committed changes before PR creation.

Repository Quick Links.description: Jump to the GitHub repository from anywhere in SiteBuilder to view the full codebase.

Chat-Based Editing.description: Describe changes in natural language: "Update the hero headline" or "Change the support email." The AI agent makes the edits for you.

Real-Time Streaming.description: Watch the AI's response stream in real-time. See changes as they're being made, not just the final result.

Auto-Scroll Toggle.description: Keep the newest messages in view automatically, or disable auto-scroll to read at your own pace.

Enter-to-Send Toggle.description: Submit instructions by pressing Enter, or toggle off to write multi-line messages.

Live Preview Pages.description: Auto-discovered list of built HTML pages updates every 3 seconds. Click to preview your changes instantly.

Loading States.description: Spinners and progress indicators during async operations. Never wonder if something is happening.

Collapsible Sections.description: Advanced settings, deleted projects, and technical details live in collapsible sections. Clean UI by default.

Markdown Rendering.description: AI responses are rendered as formatted markdown with code highlighting, lists, and proper typography.

Message History.description: Scroll through the complete conversation history. Every instruction and response is preserved.

Activity Indicators.description: See "Thinking" and "Working" badges showing AI activity. Track tool call counts during active sessions.

Tool Call Counter.description: See how many tool calls the agent has made during the session. Helps understand complexity and cost.

Technical Details View.description: Expand technical containers to see exactly which files were read, modified, or created.

Shareable Preview URLs.description: The agent provides browser-accessible preview links that you can share with colleagues for review.

View Finished Conversations.description: Access read-only views of past conversations to see what changes were discussed and made.

View Conversation History.description: See the original conversation that led to the changes. Understand context before reviewing the PR.

Smart Commit Messages.description: The agent suggests descriptive commit messages that reflect actual changes, in the language you're chatting in.

Prompt Suggestions.description: Clickable prompt suggestions from your project configuration. Hover to expand, click to insert at cursor position.

Remote Asset Manifest.description: Configure external asset manifest URLs per project. Reference images and media from centralized asset repositories.

Asset Browser UI.description: Collapsible browser panel displays all available remote assets. Search and filter to find what you need quickly.

Image Previews.description: Visual thumbnails for image assets in the browser. See what you're selecting before inserting into content.

Click-to-Insert.description: Select an asset and click to insert its URL directly into your chat message or instruction.

S3 Asset Upload.description: Upload new images directly to S3 from the editing interface. Supports IAM role assumption for secure access.

Drag-and-Drop Upload.description: Drop images directly into the upload area. Responsive side-by-side layout on wider screens.

Asset Search Filter.description: Filter assets by filename or path. Regex-powered search for advanced filtering needs.

Agent Asset Tools.description: The AI agent can list, search, and get info about remote assets to help with content editing tasks.

Heartbeat Tracking.description: 10-second heartbeats track active sessions. Stale conversations are automatically released after 5 minutes of inactivity.

Docker Isolation.description: Each workspace runs in an isolated Docker container with resource limits. No cross-workspace access is possible.

Docker Container Isolation.description: All agent commands execute in ephemeral Docker containers. Containers are destroyed after each command.

Filesystem Sandboxing.description: Each workspace is mounted at /workspace inside the container. The agent can only see and modify its own files.

Path Traversal Protection.description: All file operations are validated. Attempts to access paths outside the workspace (using ../) are blocked.

Resource Limits.description: Containers run with defined memory (2GB) and CPU (2 cores) limits to prevent runaway processes.

No Cross-Workspace Access.description: Operations in one workspace cannot read or write files in another. Complete isolation between projects.

PR URL Display.description: Direct links to pull requests from the project list and reviewer dashboard. One click to see the diff on GitHub.

Bring Your Own Key (BYOK).description: Use your own LLM API keys. Pay directly to your provider with full visibility into your own usage dashboard.

Key Reuse Across Projects.description: Already configured a key? Select from previously used keys when setting up new projects.

API Key Verification.description: Keys are validated in real-time against the provider API. Know immediately if there's an issue.

Auto-Detect Provider.description: Paste your key and SiteBuilder automatically detects whether it's OpenAI or Anthropic.

Workspace Rules Tool.description: Place markdown files in .sitebuilder/rules/ to give the agent project-specific conventions and guidelines.

Workflow Documentation.description: Public /workflow-docs page with interactive Mermaid diagrams showing workspace lifecycle states and transitions.

Multi-Language Support.description: Full English and German locale support with ~160 translation keys across all templates and UI components.

Locale-Prefixed Routing.description: Clean URL structure with /en/ and /de/ prefixes. Automatic locale detection and seamless navigation.

Language Switcher.description: Toggle between languages from anywhere in the application. Your language preference persists across sessions.

Localized Templates.description: All 14 application templates fully translated. Consistent experience regardless of language selection.
